sources.title: 1991 - Street Soldiers - Their dojo was the pavement. Their kata: survival. Martial Arts Action
sources.description:
When rival crews clash over turf and loyalty, only fists and fury can settle the score. A raw, adrenaline-pumping '90s cult classic where every block is a battlefield.

‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING
Jun Chong - Master Han (Taekwondo legend + producer!)
Jeff Rector - Priest (the ex-con with a grudge)
David Homb - Troy (caught in the crossfire)
Johnathon Gorman - Max (Tigers leader)
Katherine Armstrong - Julie (the heart of the conflict)
Jeong-lee Hwang - Tok (silent but deadly üëä)
Jude Gerard Prest - Spider (J.P.‚Äôs wildcard)
Deborah Newmark - Marie

‚ö° BEHIND THE SCENES
Directed by Lee Harry (Silent Night, Deadly Night Part 2)
Written by Spencer Grendahl & Lee Harry
Story by Jun Chong
Martial Arts Choreography: Jun Chong & Kim Kahana

üí• FUN FACT
Shot guerrilla-style across LA streets ‚Äì no permits, all passion.

metadata.Plot: When the J.P.'s sadistic leader Priest gets out of prison, he learns that his former lover has fallen for the leader of the Tigers. Both rival gangs declares an all-out gang war.
metadata.Writer: Jun Chong, Spencer Grendahl, Lee Harry
metadata.Actors: Jun Chong, Jeff Rector, David Homb
